Class.ClassComment: CacheEventConverter /** * A converter that can be used to convert the value given for an event. This converter allows for converting based on the previous value as well as the new updated value. The old value and old metadata are the previous values and the new value and new metadata are the new values even for pre and post events. * @author wburns * @since 7.0 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Converts the given newValue into something different possibly. * @param key The key for the entry that was changed for the event * @param oldValue The previous value before the event takes place * @param oldMetadata The old value before the event takes place * @param newValue The new value for the entry after the event takes place * @param newMetadata The new metadata for the entry after the event takes place * @param eventType The type of event that is being raised * @return The converted value to be used in the event */
